title: Lakshmi Kasula Haaram: Divine Grandeur in Every Glimmer
materials: and Ruby accents. Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a central Lakshmi pendant, meticulously crafted in the traditional temple jewellery style. Flanked by intricately designed peacocks with ruby accents, the pendant is adorned with high-quality CZ diamonds set in a delicate pavé style. The necklace chain consists of two strands of diamond-studded gold settings, with an Emerald topping the pendant. A row of yellow gemstones dangle as accents.
colors: and Sparkling White (CZ Diamonds). A classic South Indian color palette signifying prosperity and good fortune.
occasions: and other special occasions. A perfect heirloom piece for future generations. Can also be styled for elegant evening events.
description: This Haaram is a testament to superior craftsmanship and traditional South Indian design. The Lakshmi motif represents prosperity and abundance, making it an auspicious piece for any occasion. The high-quality gemstones and durable 22K gold ensure lasting beauty and value. The blend of traditional design and modern setting techniques makes it a versatile and timeless piece.
